title: Colossal trailer: Anne Hathaway stomps on Seoul
text:
Email 
In this writer’s opinion, the problem with movies about heavy-drinking is that they never feature enough giant, city-destroying monsters, while the problem with movies about giant, city-destroying monsters is that they never feature enough heavy-drinking. Fortunately, both of these longstanding issues are solved in Colossal (out April 7), which stars Anne Hathaway as a boozy wastrel who discovers she has some kind of psychic link with a massive, Seoul-destroying creature. 
Written and directed by Nacho Vigalondo ( Timecrimes ), Colossal costars Jason Sudeikis, Dan Stevens, Austin Stowell, and Tim Blake Nelson.
